SA15bsa059_u:3: ātmani cittaspandanapūrvau kriyābhilāpau dṛṣṭvānyatra tayordarśanādyadi spandanamanumīyeta,
SA15bsa059_u:6: tacca kāyavāgvijñaptipratibhāsi jñānaṃ jñānāntaraspandanaveśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatyevaṃ na matam / [1-3]
SA15bsa059_u:7: atha parajñānasya kriyānupalambhāt paradhīranumātuṃ na yujyata iti cet?
SA15bsa059_u:8: na; tulyatvāt paro 'pi parajñānapūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati 'taḥ tenāpi tanna jñāyate / [4-5]
SA15bsa059_u:9: ātmanaścittasya paravartinornimittatvānupapatteḥ paracittaṃ jñāyata iti cet /
SA15bsa059_u:17: svacittaspandananimittake vijñaptipratibhāsinī jñāne cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahirmukhapratibhāsinī anyanimittadutpadyete / [6-12]
SA15bsa059_u:23: tathā sati, avicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsabheda eva spandanapūrvako na bhavati /
SA15bsa059_u:27: tena hyatra kriyāviśeṣamātreṇa spandanasya pratītiritī yujyate /
SA15bsa059_u:37: tenāvaśyaṃ tau spandananimittakatvāt tadbhāve na bhavata iti vaktavyam /
SA15bsa059_u:46: atha middhenopahatatvāt puruṣasya arthaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyata iti cet /
SA15bsa059_u:48: atha svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāttadopalabhyamānā api parasantānā eveti cet /
SA15bsa059_u:49: paraṃ prativigrahītuṃ yadi yuktyāgamarahitastathāvidho 'sad vādaḥ samāśriyeta,
SA15bsa059_u:50: tadā parābhimataṃ tasya parāyattatvaṃ na ko 'pi nivārayet /
SA15bsa059_u:51: etatkeṣañcinmata eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni jñānāni santānāntarāyattāni /
SA15bsa059_u:53: kadācit svapne 'pi tasya sākṣāt santānāntarayattā iṣṭaiva;
SA15bsa059_u:58: tasya kāryatvaṃ tu cittāntare 'pi tulyamiti kathanna jñāyate?
SA15bsa059_u:59: api ca, yadi tatkriyā svasattāmātreṇa svasantānaṃ pratyāyet,
SA15bsa059_u:62: tada tatra kimanayā paramparayā - paracittāt kriyā,
SA15bsa059_u:67: spandanamātrasāmānyaṃ kriyābhilāpajñānasāmānyasya kāraṇatvāt kāryeṇa kāraṇasya gatiḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:71: etayoḥ saḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svāpādyavasthāyāmitarasyāmapi ca samānaḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:72: bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayāt paraspandanadinimittodbhūtavijñānavāsanaiva kadācitparābhogādeḥ vyavahitādapi vṛttiṃ labhate:
SA15bsa059_u:75: kriyātaḥ spandanapratipattau svāpa itarasmiñca syātpratipattiratha vā naiva kadācana /
SA15bsa059_u:86: tathā sati arthāntaravādahānyā ete 'nekāśakyanigūhanadoṣaprasaṅgāḥ mahākṛcchrā uttereṇaikena nihatā bhavanti / [52-58]
SA15bsa059_u:87: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ svamutthāpakacittasyānumānamiti nyāyyam /
SA15bsa059_u:90: nocyate paracittasamutthitavijñaptirūpatvāttatra pratibhāsijñānena samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti /
SA15bsa059_u:101: kiñca kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yatparacittajñānaṃ tatparacittaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna?
SA15bsa059_u:103: aviṣayatve tu kathaṃ jñānena paracittasattā pratīyate?
SA15bsa059_u:106: kriyāvāgbhyāṃ paracittaṃ pratipattimatāmapi tatsvarūpaviṣayīkaraṇe svacittajñānavat tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa059_u:107: tadajñāne tu tena tatsvarūpasya grahaṇaṃ katham? [65-67]
SA15bsa059_u:108: atha liṅgāt sāmānyadhigateḥ nākārasya pratītiriti cet?
SA15bsa059_u:114: tathā sati tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasahyeta ityuktam / [86-71]
SA15bsa059_u:125: tatpravartanadvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttau tadādhipatyādāgārthasya prāpteḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:132: tatra vijñaptijñānaṃ na kadāciccittaspandanādhipatyena vinā udbhavatītyataḥ tābhyāṃ ye anumīyate /
SA15bsa059_u:136: tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanādhipatyādudayaḥ tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi /
SA15bsa059_u:138: tatrāpi yādṛganumānaṃ tādṛgavisaṃvādo vyavahāraścāpyastyeveti kenāpi na gṛhyate / [82-86]
SA15bsa059_u:145: kathaṃ nāma pratyakṣeṇārthasvarūpasya agrahaṇaṃ ca bhavati /
SA15bsa059_u:154: te 'pi tadākārasadṛśasvacittapratibhāsameva jānantītyevamavadhāraṇād paracittavida iti vyavahāraḥ /
